Module AM25_myShelfie
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Shelf
public class Shelf extends Object
class shelf represent a player's shelf

  • Constructor Details

    • Shelf

      public Shelf()
      The constructor of the class initialize an empty TilesTye matrix of the right dimension

  • Method Details

    • getxBound

      public int getxBound()
      getter for xBound
      Returns:
      xBound, the dimension of shelf regarding the x axes

    • getyBound

      public int getyBound()
      getter for yBound
      Returns:
      yBound, the dimension of shelf regarding the y axes

    • add

      public void add(List<TilesType> tiles, int column) throws OutOfBoundException, FullColumnException
      add a list of tiles in the shelf
      Parameters:
      tiles - is the List of the TilesType to insert into the shelf, the order of the tiles is mantained
      column - is the index of the column in which to insert the tiles
      Throws:
      OutOfBoundException - is thrown if the column index is invalid
      FullColumnException - is thrown if there is no space for the tiles in the selected column

    • calculatePoints

      public int calculatePoints()
      calculatePoints is used to get the points related to the shelf that are not related to any goal (common or personal)
      Returns:
      points that are the points achieved by the clustering in the shelf

    • getTile

      public TilesType getTile(int x, int y) throws OutOfBoundException
      getter for a tile in position y, x
      Parameters:
      x - is the position of the tile on the x axes, so it represents the column
      y - is the position of the tile on the y axes, so it represents the row
      Returns:
      the TilesType of the tile in position y, x
      Throws:
      OutOfBoundException - when the requested position is not valid int the shelf array

    • getShelf

      public TilesType[][] getShelf()
      Getter for the current shelf state
      Returns:
      shelfCopy that is a copy of the current shelf configuration

    • setFull

      public void setFull()
      setFull is a method used to check whether a shelf is completely full. If the shelf is full its state is updated by setting isFull to true

    • isFullStatus

      public boolean isFullStatus()
      isFullStatus is a getter isFull. Is used to check whether the shelf is full
      Returns:
      true iff the board is considered full
